subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The last time Nascar ran a Nextel Cup race at Lowe's Motor Speedway the showcase event turned into a nightmare of blown tires and crashes far beyond the norm for a Cup race.
snippet: The last time Nascar ran a Nextel Cup race at Lowe's Motor Speedway the showcase event turned into a nightmare of blown tires and crashes far beyond the norm for a Cup race.
